name: BubblePhobia
description:
How far can an ordinary man go to get rid of the fear that has plagued him for a lifetime?

This is the second game I've created and this MiniJam is my first JAM, so I joined a bit not knowing what to do. With the bubble theme I decided to do something "different and weird" with the main character being afraid of them and in that same "different and weird" way I wanted to make a joke with how far a person goes by their fear, in case our character he makes a pact with a demon to finally kill every last bubble. Originally it was supposed to be bigger, this is due to the fact that I didn't know what I would be able to create by myself at that time, but in my head it would have a much more humorous tone playing with such an idiotic fear, but that would put the character in situations extremes. The end result was very small and confusing, but I managed to learn a lot of new things and despite the suffering the experience of doing it was really cool.
